about_the_game:
Introduction to Play
Four color jumps/Four color jumps is a leisure jump game.
Players need to move the small ball in the operation screen from left to right, let the small ball rise through or touch the springboard, and constantly jump up.
In addition to the default white color, the springboard has four colors. The color will be changed every time you pass through an obstacle. When encountering the springboard with the same color as the ball, the jumping range will be higher than usual~
Gold coins settled after passing the level can unlock skin and other rewards!



Operation guide
AD or ←→ key to control the ball movement

Game features
The game difficulty leisure level is more suitable for players who do not want to spend too much energy to pass the game.
I hope you can enjoy this game.



In the level selection interface, press "2" and "5" above the letter area of the keyboard at the same time to temporarily unlock the level.

About DLC
This DLC contains 12 girl animations. When you finish the game, you can activate the animation. DLC contains adult nudity.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

detailed_description:
Regarding DLC installation

To install the DLC, please make sure you have purchased the game first, then click on Add to Library, and then look for the DLC Management Panel on the right side of your game library. Click on Manage My DLC to install or uninstall the DLC.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

short_description: Four color jumps is a leisure jumping game. The ball rises, crosses or touches the springboard, and constantly jumps up. Let's see where the limit of the ball is!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
